Fields.DialogueText: *KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK*
*CREEAKK*
Evening, Ryūjō. What a nice surprise...
I can't sleep.
The feeling's mutual.
May I?
My objections have never stopped you before.
Azassu.
What is it this time? Hungry? Excited? We haven't received word of a new mission yet so I'm struggling to grasp why exactly you're here.
I've been thinking a lot about our last mission. I hold a lot of responsibility. I must live my life with those lost forever in my memory.
That is true.
I've decided to get out of this rut and try something new!

Fields.MenuText: I'm glad to hear you're on the mend.

Fields.DialogueText: It would be insult to those who gave their lives if I were to waste mine moping.

Fields.MenuText: How about going to bed at a reasonable hour?

Fields.DialogueText: Are you implying you don't wait up for my midnight visits?

Fields.MenuText: What did you have in mind?

Fields.DialogueText: I haven't decided what exactly my new passion will be, but once I know, I'll be sure to let you know!
Well, I'm happy to hear it. This probably could have waited until the morning, though.
Oh, that wasn't the only reason I came to see you. There was something else... something important...
*ALARM*
Right! We're under attack!
*Sigh* I'll meet you on the deck.
Ryōkai!
@BATTLE
Kanchou! There you are!
Something the matter?
Uun. I just wanted to let you know that I've decided what will be my next pursuit!
Well, let's hear it.
Okay, brace yourself... I'm going to learn to ride a motorcycle!
I... certainly didn't see that one coming.
It's perfect! It's something I've never tried, have no knowledge about, and can receive my full dedication!

Fields.MenuText: For someone that can take to the heavens, I wouldn't have thought a motorized scooter would prove very exhilarating.

Fields.DialogueText: That's not the point! I don't care whether or not something is exciting or not. It's about sinking my teeth into something I know nothing about!

Fields.MenuText: Why did you choose such a pursuit?

Fields.DialogueText: I don't know how to do it and thanks to my mistakes, I have to live my life three or four times over to ensure those in the afterlife do not feel cheated!

Fields.MenuText: This wouldn't have anything to do with Sōryū, would it?

Fields.DialogueText: Soryu-senpai? Is she into motorcycles too? Must be a coincidence...
*ALARM*
Morganas! Sorry, Ryūjō but we'll have to skip the introductory course in favor of something you're already well-versed in!
Hai!
@BATTLE
Ryūjō, you're still looking for a bike, right?
Hm? Un. I don't know where I expect to get one, though.
It's your lucky day. I just got off the horn with some of our superiors about the next mission. I asked if they happened to know where we could acquire a bike.
... You did...?
One officer said he's be happy to deliver one along with some documentation we'll need going forward.
... Shinu!!
What's the matter?! I thought this was what you wanted.
It is! But I can't have the Imperial Navy know I plan on avoiding my duties to take up a new hobby! Dōshio...

Fields.MenuText: What happened to all that gusto before? Weren't you going to act like Sōryū.

Fields.DialogueText: I will! Just not today! Not in front of an Imperial officer!

Fields.MenuText: My apologies, I was only trying to help.

Fields.DialogueText: Shitteru, shitteru... I just wish you didn't care as much sometimes! It would make things a lot easier if you would just berate me like everyone else!

Fields.MenuText: Do you think people expect you to be working 24/7?

Fields.DialogueText: No, of course not, but the assumption is that my downtime will be used for self-reflection, training, or pretty much anything EXCEPT horseplay.
*ALARM*
Maybe I can curry some favor by swiftly dispatching of these Morganas. That'll make me exempt from any kind of punishment, right...? Right?!
@BATTLE
I can't stand still...! He'll be here any minute...

Fields.MenuText: Relax, I'll cover for you.

Fields.DialogueText: You don't understand, Kanchou! These people can see through a lie in an instant! Believe me, I've tried to tell enough of them to the point where I've given up.

Fields.MenuText: I'm sure he'll understand you need some free time.

Fields.DialogueText: Even if he does, it will be after a stern telling off!

Fields.MenuText: If you look guilty, he'll have a free pass to scold you. Try to look like you belong.

Fields.DialogueText: That's what all my senpais do and I will try to emulate... at another time...
Kanchou.
Welcome aboard.
Where is your ship's Kami?
Hm? She's right... Where did she...?
Here...
Why are you hiding behind me?
I just thought it would be best for me not to intrude on such a formal conversation.
... Regardless, I brought what you asked for. I'll have it loaded onto the ship.
Much obliged.
Although, I don't see why you require such a device. Even if I advocated rewarding a Kami, this one's last mission ended in catastrophic failure.
As I said. Much... obliged.
Tch. We'll be keeping a close on your two. We already have enough troublesome Belles representing Japan. We don't need another.
*ALARM*
Hadn't you better see to that? For the love of all that is holy do not let me keep you.
@BATTLE
What was all that about?
Gomen, Kanchou. When it comes to Imperial officers, I just can't keep it together. I feel like a child being scolded for not cleaning my room!

Fields.MenuText: Have you tried speaking your case?

Fields.DialogueText: It seems like anything I do is met with scorn. It doesn't help that I barely have any accomplishments to prove my worth yet.

Fields.MenuText: Channel your inner Sōryū!

Fields.DialogueText: Sōryū-senpai is in another league when it comes to this kind of stuff. She can make even Imperial officers feel intimidated.

Fields.MenuText: Try not to hide behind me next time.

Fields.DialogueText: It was working perfectly until you ratted me out!
Regardless, let's head back out to sea. I spy a few Morganas in the distance likely to give us some trouble.
Hai!
@BATTLE
Kanchou! The officer left a few documents outlining our next mission.

Fields.MenuText: Are you sure you're ready.
I'm glad to see you're ready for the next task!
What will we be doing this time?

Fields.DialogueText: Kanchou, there's a war on. I'm not a child, if we halted progression to mourn every dead soldier we'd never take another step.
I owe victory to those whose lives were lost in my care!
It seems to be something just as deceptively simple as last time.
This isn't exactly an escort mission - more a delivery. Several damaged planes will be transported to a port town nearby where a trained team will repair them. Here, take a look.
It says we're set to receive the delivery of the said planes at the next stop.
This time I'll prove my worth for sure!
*ALARM*
You already prove it every day you help me take down Morganas!
Then I better work hard to stay in your good books!
@BATTLE
That's the last of the damaged planes loaded onto the ship.
If there's no further business, we can head back out.
I don't suppose you'd want to purchase any new bombers while we're docked? It might help me to feel a little better about being scolded by the Imperial officer.

Fields.MenuText: I can't resist that face.

Fields.DialogueText: Yatta! You won't regret it, Kanchou! I'll put them to great use!

Fields.MenuText: Are you guilt-tripping me?

Fields.DialogueText: I would never! You know what, forget the whole thing. I'm too insulted to even talk about it anymore.
*ALARM*
The first of many fights on our next journey, don't you think?
Anshinshite, Kanchou! I'm ready for anythign!
@BATTLE

Fields.MenuText: Imperial scoldings happen. You're the Belle and they're not.

Fields.DialogueText: Dangerous words, Kanchou... but they do make me feel stronger.
Bah! Stupid thing!
*TWANG*
The bike is proving more trouble than its worth?
Everytime I lift my legs up, I get scared and have to put them back down again. How does Sōryū-senpai make this sound so easy?!

Fields.MenuText: Perhaps we should get you some training wheels.

Fields.DialogueText: ... Don't toy with me, Kanchou.

Fields.MenuText: You fly above the sky but are afraid of falling two feet?

Fields.DialogueText: At least when I fly I know the only way I'm going to fall is if I'm shot out of the sky.
And that relieves you?!
Well, in that case, I know I'll be dead so I don't have to worry about falling and hurting myself!

Fields.MenuText: Would you like some help?

Fields.DialogueText: ... Onegaishimasu...
*ALARM*
After we deal with these Morganas, let me give you a hand.
Azassu!
@BATTLE
There we go, just like that.
If you let go, I swear I will burn this ship to the ground, myself along with it!
I promised, didn't I? I'm not going to let go.
Do you know how to ride a motorcycle, Kanchou?

Fields.MenuText: Of course - who doesn't?

Fields.DialogueText: Geez, Kanchou, kick a girl when she's down why don't you...

Fields.MenuText: I can barely ride a bicycle.

Fields.DialogueText: That makes me feel both understood and even more nervous that someone like you is teaching me...

Fields.MenuText: I've never tried, but I'd like to learn.

Fields.DialogueText: Once I master it, I'll be sure to teach you, so don't worry!
Okay, and here we go!
I'm doing it!
You're doing--
*CRASH*
... You okay...?
You said you wouldn't let go...
*ALARM*
What say I handle these Morganas while you get yourself... patched up.
@BATTLE
Kanchou... Can you see that in the distance?
Hm. Good eye, that looks to be a fleet of Morganas!
What are your orders?

Fields.MenuText: Can you engage that many?

Fields.DialogueText: Who are you talking to?!

Fields.MenuText: I'm assuming "retreat" isn't an option?

Fields.DialogueText: I don't know the meaning of the word!

Fields.MenuText: Full steam ahead!

Fields.DialogueText: That's what I like to hear!
Let's take them out!
Hai! Stand back, Kanchou.
@BATTLE
*BOOM*
What happened out there?! You were primed to launch an attack but stopped?
I... I... I think it best if we retreat!
What?!
Retreat! I'm getting us out of here! We'll take a different course!
What happened out there? You looked ready to unleash hell but...
Gah! I'm so in my head!

Fields.MenuText: Is this about the last mission?
Is this about the Imperial officer?
Is this about trying too hard to be like Sōryū?

Fields.DialogueText: I can't help but think someone like Soryu-senpai would have all this figured out by now.
I just don't want to make the same mistake twice and jeopardize the lives of the crew.
I guess his words cut deeper than I thought.
There's no rush. Sometimes it takes a while to wrap your head around things. That's what training wheels are for. I'm sure you'll figure out how to move forward eventually.
So, are you saying you're my training wheels?
I guess I am.
... I'm not a child, I don't need training wheels.
My apologies.
Demo, Azassu, Kanchou. Hontōni.
*ALARM*
There don't look to be that many this time? What do you say we fend them off together?!
Hai!
@BATTLE
DON'T LET GO!
I ALREADY SAID I WON'T!
YOU SAID THAT LAST TIME!
JUST TRUST ME!
I-I'm doing it! Look, I didn't last thing long las time we--
*CRASH*

Fields.MenuText: Are you okay?

Fields.DialogueText: Can Kami break bones? Because, if they can, I think all of mine are shattered.

Fields.MenuText: You did better than last time...

Fields.DialogueText: While nice, it doesn't make my bruises hurt any less.

Fields.MenuText: *Pffft*

Fields.DialogueText: Don't... say... a word...
Why are you trying to force this so much?
I asked you to get me this bike, so if I don't master it, I'll be letting you down.
Ryūjō...
And if I can't complete a mission, I'll be letting my superiors down! And if I don't do well then I'll be letting everyone who worked hard to rebuild me down! And--
*ALARM*
Whoa, whoa, whoa! One thing at a time. First things first. Let us handle the Morganas while you get that bike upright.
Hai...
@BATTLE
Now, where were we?
I was starting to spiral.
Right! Of course.
You don't need to worry so much, I think.
No? And why is that?

Fields.MenuText: If you can't complete a mission...
If you choose to pick your battles...
If you can't ride a motorcycle...

Fields.DialogueText: Hm?
Hm?
Hm?
I'll still be her to cheer you on.
I'll support your decision to the bitter end and protect you myself.
Then we'll throw the damn thing overboard!
Kanchou...
Stop worrying about how others perceive you. If you're trying your bes, that's more than enough in my book.
*ALARM*
*Ahem* Wow, who knew you were such a softie, Kanchou. *Ahem* That was all rather mushy, wasn't it?
Something stuck in your throat?
*AHEM!* Maybe some seawater will help clear it up. I'll be right back!
@BATTLE
Phew! We finally made it! It's nice to touch land again!
Where is this mechanic? He's already thirty minutes late!
While we're waiting, Kanchou, I think I spy an arms dealer in the distance. What do you say, am I due for a treat?

Fields.MenuText: Very well.

Fields.DialogueText: You're so good to me, Kanchou!

Fields.MenuText: Nice try.

Fields.DialogueText: One day you'll see the value in listening to me.
I think some Morganas are trying to dock. Our mechanic doesn't look to be showing up anytime soon, so let's take care of them.
Hai!
@BATTLE

Fields.MenuText: I'll sure give him a treat if he's in the unsanctioned weapons trade.

Fields.DialogueText: There's a lot of that around these days, isn't there?
Sorry about the delay! Everything looks to be accounted for, so thanks again for making the trip.
It was our pleasure. Was there anything else?
Well, since you ask, several of my men are posted at an island nearby. I'd like to sail them home but we're a little under-equipped. Do you think you could escort us?
Escort...?
Unfortunately, I don't think we have the time to--
Mochiron. Please get ready to move out.
Thank you kindly.

Fields.MenuText: *Inquisitive look*

Fields.DialogueText: Don't look at me like that! I know what I said. I'll be fine.

Fields.MenuText: It's a little soon, don't you think?

Fields.DialogueText: When you fall off a bike, you have to get straight back on or you'll be afraid forever.

Fields.MenuText: I'm really proud of you.

Fields.DialogueText: Sonna koto iwanaide, Kanchou! You're embarrassing yourself...
Very well. Let's move out! Any Morganas blocking our exit, I'll leave to you!
Hai!
@BATTLE
Kanchou! Care to join me?
If you don't mind, I'd love-- Gah! What is that smell?!
You might be surprised to know you aren't the first person to react in such a way today.
What are you eating?!
A durian. The aircraft mechanic gave me some as thanks for escorting her and her men.

Fields.MenuText: That stench is ungodly.

Fields.DialogueText: Yeah, but I can't say no to a present so I'll force myself to like it.

Fields.MenuText: Those are pretty valuable, you know?

Fields.DialogueText: Really? You should tell the texture because it certainly doesn't taste valuable.

Fields.MenuText: Can I try one?

Fields.DialogueText: Oho, so you bad mouth my food and then want to try. Kotowaru!
*ALARM*
Morganas!
Hayaku, we'll load the remaining fruit into the cannons! That'll drive them off!
@BATTLE
Thank you for agreeing to help me with the bike again, Kanchou.
Well, I could hardly say no when you looked as if you were about to--
Hai, hai, we don't need to get into the semantics of it.
Okay then, here we go!
Steady... steady...
No pull the throttle a little.
Hai...

Fields.MenuText: I'm going to let go now!

Fields.DialogueText: Don't tell me, just do it!

Fields.MenuText: Shall I let go now?

Fields.DialogueText: Don't ask, just do it like your ripping off a bandage.

Fields.MenuText: Shall I keep holding you?

Fields.DialogueText: Iie... Hanase!
Balance... balance...!
Turning... turning...
You're doing it! That's almost a full lap around the deck!
How do I stop?!
Hit the brakes!!
Look out!
*KLASH*
itetete... Daijōbuka, Kanchou?
I think I popped a hip. Regardless, otsukaresamadeshita.
Tehe! It was child's play!
*ALARM*
Be a dear and handle those Morganas for me, would you? I think I need to see the doctor.
Hai! Makasete!
@BATTLE
Kanchou, mite, mite! There's the island!
And the aircraft technician's vessel looks to be in top shape.
*KABOOM*
Morganas!
Another ambush!
What shall we--?
*WROOOOAR*
Ryūjō!

Fields.MenuText: Be careful out there!

Fields.DialogueText: *WROOOAR*
If that means "thank you" then, you're welcome!

Fields.MenuText: Don't worry! You've already me proud!

Fields.DialogueText: *WROOOAR*

Fields.MenuText: Go get them!

Fields.DialogueText: *WROOOAR*
@BATTLE
*WROOOAR*
Keep at it! They're almost all sunk!
Ryūjō! Are you okay?
I can't risk any more time letting loose in that form! I might inadvertently damage the escort ship!

Fields.MenuText: What do you propose?

Fields.DialogueText: Aren't YOU supposed to be in charge?!

Fields.MenuText: So, we're all out of options?

Fields.DialogueText: Not quite!

Fields.MenuText: A wise decision?

Fields.DialogueText: I'm full of them!
What I need to do is somehow inform the escort ship to make their way to us! If we can evacuate them all, I can fight back without worry!
I've already tried but the radio's down! And they're not close enough for you to just appear there...
If only I could jump to them somehow...
There *is* an alternative to running. If you're game...
Oh, no...
We'll cover you! Hurry!
No!
@BATTLE
Would that work? I thought Belles were pretty much stuck to short distances from their own decks...
I think it could work. I think I could *make* it work. But I'd have to run at, like, 100km an hour to do it, and-
I instructed the crew to construct a makeshift ramp! if you go up here at full speed on the bike, it's a straight shot to the escort ship's deck!
I'm leaving you NOTHING in my will!

Fields.MenuText: Just do it!
I believe in you!
*Cross fingers*

Fields.DialogueText: I'M GOING TO!
GEE, THANKS!
WHAT KIND OF HALF-BAKED BELIEF IS THAT?!
It's now or never!
*VROOOOOM*
If I make it, I'll tell the crew to head to the back of the ship! Please pull them up when you see them!
Eyes in front of you!
KYAAAA!
*KABOOM*
Did she make it?! Damn Morganas, I can't see anything. Provide cover fire!
@BATTLE
Ryūjō?! Ryūjō?!
Hello! Can you hear me?!
Hello?!
We were told to evacuate! Can you pull us up?

Fields.MenuText: Then that means...
She did it?!
Where's--

Fields.DialogueText: *WROOOAR*
Ryūjō!
Of course we'll pull you guys up! Quickly, men! Although, I'm afriad you may have to say goodbye to your ship! When she gets like this, even I can't control her!
@BATTLE
Ryūjō! Are you hurt?!
I don't think so... How is the crew...?
They're fine! You did it! The jump, the saving; you did it all!
Yokatta...

Fields.MenuText: Get her some water!
Get her to the infirmary!
Get us to land!

Fields.DialogueText: I'm fine, Kanchou... If anything...
Just let me stay still for a moment, Kanchou... In fact...
They can't make the ship move any faster, Kanchou... Please, just...
What is it?
Just stay with me here for a while...
... Honestly, what am I going to do with you?
Tehe...
Any Morganas blocking our entrance to the port, I'll leave in the crew's hands. Get to work!
@BATTLE
I'm feeling much better now, Kanchou! I think I'm ready to head out again.
Just humor me.
Mō, Being cooped up in bed is starting to feel like a punishment!

Fields.MenuText: I still can't believe you made that jump.

Fields.DialogueText: Neither can I. I'm still half-convinced I died out there and this is heaven.

Fields.MenuText: We're going to have to pay back the technician for any damage to her ship.

Fields.DialogueText: My bad... I couldn't really tell friend from foe out there.

Fields.MenuText: If this is a punishment, you should consider yourself lucky.

Fields.DialogueText: Wakatta.
You'll be right as rain soon enough. In the meantime, I'm going to check if we have any unwanted guests.
Itterashai~
@BATTLE
Ah! You're out and about again!
I'm sorry about what happened to your ship.
Don't be - your captain has already arranged to have our expenses covered. Besides, we're just grateful to have gotten out with our lives. You really saved us back there.
She's very capable when it comes to stuff like this.
I can tell. You should be proud of yourself, little miss.
Arigatō gōzaimasu...
In fact, a few of my men were so impressed, they were wondering if they could join you on your journey? They've yet to find their sea legs good and proper, but I've no use for them anymore.

Fields.MenuText: The more the merrier.

Fields.DialogueText: Splendid! I'll let them know!

Fields.MenuText: We're already at capacity right now - but thank you anyway.

Fields.DialogueText: I understand.
Thanks again! You've got a good one there, Captain!
Right, then. Shall we get back out to sea?
Hai! I'm ready and waiting!
@BATTLE

Fields.MenuText: Send them down to the nearest recruitment center. They might get lucky.

Fields.DialogueText: True, Kanchou. One step at a time.
Morganas! Let's handle them quickly!
Hai!
@BATTLE
We should be receiving word of our next mission any day now.
What shall we do in the meantime?

Fields.MenuText: There's always more work to be done.

Fields.DialogueText: I was afraid you'd say that...

Fields.MenuText: How about letting me have a go on your bike?

Fields.DialogueText: Sure! I can teach you how to jump a ramp easily!

Fields.MenuText: Do you have any more durian?

Fields.DialogueText: Yappari, Kanchou, you snuck some while I wasn't looking, didn't you?! I knew you'd developed a taste for it.
Whatever it is you do, just don't ask my permission. You don't need approval for anything on this ship.
Really? In that case...
*HUG*
Ryūjō?
If you tell Sōryū-senpai I acted this soft, I'll never speak to you again.
Of course. It's our little secret.
Azassu, Kanchou... For everything.
